title: Mac issue: Not sure if fps drop or connection issue
body:
for the past 5 or so patches i have had this issue, my ping is stable at 50-60 and my fps stays at 60 but i miss chunks of the game mostly in team fights ie. for every 10 seconds of gameplay i miss about 2 seconds. I say this is a mac issue because on the windows half of the computer there is no such problem  everything is exactly the same aside from the OS. I have tried everything.


OSX Yosemite 10.10.2
Mac Pro (Early 2008)
2 x 3.2 GHz Quad-Core Intel Xeon
16 GB 800 MHz DDR2 FB-DIMM
ATI Radeon HD 5870 1024 MB

Running windows 7 most recent version via bootcamp

@riot can you please help?


edit: i just reinstalled it still the problem remains

replies.body:
What do you mean by "miss"? Is it that your display remains the exact same (ie. zero fps but it's not counting for some reason?) or that in-game actions aren't registering for a moment (ie. your client is not updating with the current state of the game, which is lag)?

Have you made sure that your computer is completely updated and free of viruses?
